name: Yash Kokate
headline: Aspiring Trader | BFM Graduate | Market Enthusiast Focused on Strategy, Risk, and Execution.

education.degree: Bachelor of Financial Market, Finance, General
education.details: Graduated with Distinction (as per resume). Skills mentioned on LinkedIn: Risk Management, Investments +3 skills.

experience.title: Equity Trader
experience.location: Frankfurt am Main, Hesse, Germany · Remote
experience.description: Conducted comprehensive technical and fundamental market analysis, enabling profitable sector rotation and options strategies. Supported equity and derivatives trades, focusing on risk management during high volatility. Assisted in portfolio management, applying risk management techniques; contributed to a 22% annual return, outperforming benchmarks with strategies such as sector rotation and covered calls. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize portfolio performance, applying data-driven insights and quantitative analysis.

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: Led secondary research and delivered accurate, high-quality reports within deadlines. Analyzed companies, markets, and sectors such as healthcare, consumer goods, financial services, and fintech. Prepared detailed company profiles, including financial analysis, data visualization using python and matplotlib, SWOT, and strategy evaluations. Utilized databases such as D&B and Lexis Nexis for qualitative and quantitative research. Gained experience in interpreting data and presenting insights tailored to client requirements.

projects.name: Investment Risk Management (Coursera Project)
projects.description: Undertook calculations for portfolio beta, monthly returns, Treynor Ratio, and Value at Risk (VaR). Visualized data using graphs to assess investment risk and performance. Learned to quantify risk-to-reward using the Treynor Ratio and evaluate portfolio risks through VaR analysis. Gained insights into risk concepts, standard deviation, and their applications in investment management.

projects.name: A Study on Stock Market (Research Project)
projects.description: Carried out an in-depth research project examining the intricacies of the stock market, with a focus on various stock exchanges, investment principles, and market participants. Focused on the Indian stock market, particularly the NSE, and BSE, and their regulatory frameworks; explored various investment types, with emphasis on mutual funds, equity, and debt investments.

New York Jobs CEO Council - Financial Analyst Job Simulation

certifications.name: Format a Financial Model with Maccabus

extracurricular.name: Bank of America Investment Banking Virtual Experience
extracurricular.description: Identified an acquisition target through SWOT analysis; built a Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) model, conducted sensitivity analysis, and created a detailed company profile.

extracurricular.name: Goldman Sachs Excel skills for Business job simulation
extracurricular.description: Acquired advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including VBA Macros, data analysis, and data visualization; leveraged Excel-based tools for financial storytelling.

extracurricular.name: New York jobs CEO Council Financial Analyst job simulation
extracurricular.description: Assisted senior bankers in evaluating a potential partnership with a Big Tech company; delivered key insights through a strategic analysis of financial data.

extracurricular.name: "Mudra" Inter-Collegiate Future and Options Trading Competition
extracurricular.description: Positioned 1st; generated a 12.8% profit on total capital in a single day; achieved highest overall profit, showcasing expertise in options trading strategies and equity market analysis.
